title: Here’s Why Influencer, Olivia Noceda, Switched to Chino Valley Ranchers’ Organic Omega-3 Soy-Free Eggs
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Olivia Noceda, a Southern California native and food blogger, recently shared why she chooses Chino Valley Ranchers’ Organic Omega-3 Soy-Free Eggs to her Instagram feed (@olive.eeeats).

Since the 1950’s, Chino Valley Ranchers have been producing and distributing high-quality eggs around the Southern California region. Chino Valley Ranchers was one of the first companies to produce organic eggs and are now one of the leading providers of organic eggs in the country.

“We offer specialized diets that lead to specific nutrients and organic options. By doing so, our hens are able to enjoy healthier lives, which in turn produces better quality eggs,” says Chris Nichols, co-owner of Chino Valley Ranchers.

Before discovering Chino Valley Ranchers, Noceda could not support the treatment of the chickens that produced the eggs she was buying. She knew that those chickens were being treated unethically. It was a truck on the freeway carrying a thousand chickens that made her feel particularly passionate about finding humane eggs. After finding Chino Valley Ranchers Organic Omega-3 Soy-Free Eggs, she knew she could enjoy humane eggs without feeling guilty.

“We are what we eat,” said Noceda. “I’ve started buying Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs at my local grocery store because now every time I crack an egg and eat it, I feel good.”

Noceda continues to make her foods with the help of the eggs from Chino Valley Ranchers. She believes in filling her body up with what feels right at that moment, and naturally produced eggs like those from Chino Valley Ranchers allow her to do so. Read more about Noceda’s journey to a healthy, wholesome lifestyle on her blog.

Chino Valley Ranchers’ egg products are available at Mother’s Market, Sprouts and other various grocery stores. To learn more about Chino Valley Ranchers’ high-quality egg products, visit their website at www.ChinoValleyRanchers.com or contact them at (800) 354-4503!
